segments.text: Mom , what are we going to make tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Curry and rice . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds nice . I can peel the potatoes first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ! Oh , honey , you are so sweet . I'll chop up this carrot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , just turn down the stove .
segments.speaker: S2
